    Why Kniw?

    All things considered

    Accessible

    Auditory, cognitive, neurological, physical, speech, and visual accessibility challenges are considered throughout our design process.

    Optimized

    Every millisecond counts. We optimize everything from the domain level down to asset compression and delivery to improve visitor retention.

    Secure

    Secure encryption, multi-factor authentication, backup and restoration, regularly scheduled audits, updates and well-tested code.

    Data-driven

    With in-depth real-time usage statistics and A/B split testing we can eliminate guesswork from the design process.

    Supported

    Our training, documentation, phone and chat support provide the peace of mind you need at any time.

    Future-proof

    We build semantic, scalable and progressive web apps that work flawlessly everywhere, ready for the future.

    K

    Kniw is a web design and development studio based in Nashville, TN. Specializing in mobile responsive web platforms
